siteTitle: JungleCode - Navigate Japan's Market with Confidence for AI Companies

hero.title: Want to Succeed in Japan? Start Here.
hero.subtitle: Tap into Asia's most mature $9 trillion economy with local insights, strategic guidance, and deep market knowledge.

about.title: You Bring the AI Vision. We’ll Help You Land It in Japan.
about.description: JungleCode offers strategic insight rooted in lived experience — bridging cultural expectations, business norms, and legal frameworks so your AI venture can succeed in Japan. Whether you're exploring the market or ready to scale, we help you move with clarity, purpose, and momentum.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To support AI ventures as they grow into Japan — not just with answers, but with context, partnership, and care.

keyPoints.title: Cultural Insight
keyPoints.description: We’ve built in Japan — and we understand what it takes to succeed here.

keyPoints.title: Strategic Guidance
keyPoints.description: Whether you’re exploring or already expanding, we meet you where you are.

keyPoints.title: Trusted Access
keyPoints.description: We bring you into the room with people who matter — and help you make it count.

challenges.title: Challenges We Help You Navigate
challenges.intro: Entering Japan means facing unique friction points — from slow-moving buyers to regulatory intricacies and high-context communication. We help you break through each one, with local context and executional clarity.

challenges.title: Local Insight
challenges.challenge: It’s hard to know what’s working — or even who to talk to.
challenges.solution: We help you understand how the market works and where your opportunity actually lies.

challenges.title: Warm Leads
challenges.challenge: No matter how great your offering is, cold starts rarely go anywhere.
challenges.solution: We bring you into trusted conversations that lead to real traction.

challenges.title: Showing Respect
challenges.challenge: Even small things — like silence or seating — carry meaning here.
challenges.solution: We coach you on the unspoken rules that build confidence and trust.

challenges.title: Saying Less
challenges.challenge: Overexplaining can come off as insecure or pushy.
challenges.solution: We help you strike the right balance — clear, calm, and intentional.

challenges.title: Legal Boundaries
challenges.challenge: The rules aren’t always obvious — until they stop your momentum.
challenges.solution: We give you clarity early, so you can move forward without worry.

challenges.title: Trust Expectations
challenges.challenge: Japan expects more than just a good product — they expect reliability.
challenges.solution: We help you show you’re serious — and build the kind of trust that lasts.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We walk with you through every step of your Japan journey — from planning to partnerships to presence.

primary.title: Entry Planning
primary.description: We help you move forward with clarity — building a foundation that respects the market and sets you up for growth.
features: Clarity on what Japan really needs
Strategy grounded in timing and context

secondary.title: Local Traction
secondary.description: We help you show up well — and get into the right rooms with the right people.

secondary.title: Market Fit
secondary.description: We help your work make sense here — not just in words, but in tone, format, and trust signals.

steps.title: Early Discovery
steps.description: We start by understanding what you’re building — and whether Japan’s a good fit right now.

steps.title: Thoughtful Planning
steps.description: Together, we build a practical roadmap that fits your team, your vision, and this market.

steps.title: Hands-On Support
steps.description: From setup to partner meetings, we help you move forward with confidence — and avoid stalling out.

steps.title: Long-Term Growth
steps.description: As you grow, we help you adapt to what’s changing — and keep building momentum.

whyJapan.title: Why Japan Matters
whyJapan.intro: Japan is one of the world’s most advanced economies — with the structure, trust, and appetite for innovation that make it ideal for market expansion.

sections.title: Market Dynamics
items: $9T economy with deep investments in automation and productivity
Large enterprise sector seeking scalable, long-term solutions
Strong alignment between public policy and innovation
Tech-savvy buyers who demand precision and trust
Strategic entry point for expansion across Asia

sections.title: Key Advantages
items: High IP protection and low tolerance for bad actors
Government support for AI-driven transformation
Reliable, modern infrastructure across industries
High brand loyalty for trusted partners
Premium pricing accepted for proven performance

sections.title: Success Factors
items: Long-term partnerships built on credibility
High standards for transparency and reliability
Deep respect for quality, ethics, and craft
Preference for structured onboarding and integration
Clear expectations for support, compliance, and continuity

getStarted.title: Getting Started
getStarted.subtitle: Take the first step toward entering Japan with purpose, clarity, and an experienced local partner.

consultationSteps.title: Discovery Call
items: Understand your objectives and entry motivation
Assess market timing and strategic alignment
Identify major risks and blockers
Outline our working model

consultationSteps.title: Strategic Review
items: Evaluate possible entry pathways
Estimate resources and internal readiness
Map your positioning and messaging
Share early recommendations

consultationSteps.title: Proposal Delivery
items: Provide a structured roadmap
Detail services, scope, and timelines
Align on investment and team fit
Set the foundation for launch

contact.title: Request a Consultation
contact.subtitle: Tell us about your goals and timeline. We'll follow up with a structured plan to move forward.

footer.tagline: Your guide to entering Japan with clarity.

team.name: Jet Villegas
team.bio: A senior engineering leader with 6+ years directing global engineering operations from Tokyo, where he leads teams across three continents. During his 25+ year career, he has built technology reaching billions of people worldwide, from pioneering browser platforms to transforming job advertising systems that process billions of daily requests while helping millions find work. His experience with AI technologies provides valuable insights for startups entering the Japanese market.

team.name: Aditya Pandya
team.bio: A product leader with 5+ years in Japan who scaled a global job platform from 150M to 2.1B annual applications while based in Tokyo. During his 15+ year career, he has built products reaching over 100M people and generating $6B+ in revenue, while leading international teams of 150+ people and pioneering innovations that have helped tens of millions find work. He brings deep expertise in AI product strategy for the Japanese market.
